name: Leovinus` Ring
description: "A spectacularly preserved ring made of a strange very malleable material. Seems rather silly."

name: Slith Primal Ring
description: "There is a lingering stench about this ring that won`t wash out."

name: Viloth`s Ring
description: "A crudely fashioned piece of jewelry. Strange that a slith would use such a thing."

name: Reddan Memento Ring
description: "A worn out inscription along the band says: With love - Amelia"

name: Skinner Family Seal
description: "Likely the most valuable item the family had ever owned."

description: "A crudely fashioned piece of jewelry. Strange that a slith would use such a thing."

name: Cronley`s Signet
description: "Stained with the blood of his victims, now joined by his own."

name: Marrow Band
description: Calls forth a guardian with strong defenses and high threat.

name: Lorekeeper`s Band
description: Surrounds the caster in a ring of flame that burns enemies within its radius.

name: Alkamos` Anguish
description: "Agony..."

name: Alkamos` Dread
description: "Death..."

name: Cursebearer
description: "This twisted ring is rumored to have borne a terrifying curse for its master, the effects of which still linger within it to this day."

name: Signet of the Runefather
description: "Mark of the Runefather, creator of the original runic tongue now commonly used by the Luminari."

name: Anchorite`s Seal
description: Provoke nearby foes with a shockwave emanating from your shield. Requires a shield.

name: Ring of Eternal Rot
description: Retaliates with a blast of poisonous fumes, poisoning all nearby enemies.

name: Seal of the Blazing Inferno
description: Surrounds the caster in a ring of flame that burns enemies within its radius.

name: Aetherlord`s Signet
description: "A ring commonly carried by nobles possessed by Aetherial spirits."

name: Apothecary`s Wisdom
description: The light of Empyrion soothes the wounds of nearby allies.

name: Chillsurge Ring
description: "The sapphires within this ring absorb heat with the slightest touch."

name: Goliath Signet
description: Create a fissure at the target area, slowing and stunning any enemies caught within it.

name: Starfire
description: "Cast from the burning remains of a fallen star."

name: Signet of Astral Ruminations
description: "Secrets of the stars whisper from this ring, but they are incomprehensible to untrained ears."

skill_params.state_name: Fire Damage converted to Vitality Damage

skill_params.state_name: Piercing Damage converted to Acid Damage

name: Sigil of the Depraved
description: A bolt of entropic power tears through the fabric of reality to inflict massive damage on any foe it strikes. Striking a target directly with the bolt inflicts double damage.

name: Signet of the Damned
description: Creates an occult sigil on the ground that consumes the life-force of enemies caught within its power, returning a portion of the damage dealt as health to the caster.

name: Combustion Band
description: Inflict searing magical flames upon your foes that sear the flesh and melt through armor.

name: Deathlord`s Band
description: A pool of filthy blood forms beneath your foes.

name: Glyph of Kelphat`Zoth
description: "Signet granted by Kelphat`Zoth, Grand Harbinger of Ch`Thon, upon his most loyal followers."

name: Lifegiver Signet
description: Drink in the life essence of nearby foes in a deadly display of martial combat. Requires a melee weapon.

description: A lance of pure flame pierces through your foes.

name: Menhirian
description: "Sigil of the Temple of Menhir, bestowed upon its most zealous followers."

name: Signet of the Fallen
description: Curse your foes with the torment of the dead, weakening their hold on the physical realm.

name: Time-Flux Band
description: Tear a warp in time itself at the location of your attacker.

name: Band of the Eternal Haunt
description: Inflict a tormenting haunt upon your target that spreads among your foes.

name: Band of the Eternal Pyre
description: You ignite the very ground beneath your foes.

Cold Damage converted to Fire Damage

name: Entropic Coil
description: Strike your foe with entropic energy that ignites their very being.

name: Ring of the Black Matriarch
description: "Signet of the Black Matriach, a ruthless assassin who utilized spider venom to paralyze and execute her opponents."

name: Screams of the Aether
description: "A mockery of the agonizing possession process."

name: Yugol`s Ichor
description: "Dripping with darkness that threatens to consume your flesh."

name: Closed Fist of Vengeance
description: You seal the fate of your foes, confident in the judgment you cast upon them.

skill_params.state_name: Reduced Attack Speed Retaliation for 2 Seconds

name: Invoker`s Burning Hand
description: Mark your foe with an arcane sigil that leaves them vulnerable to your elemental assault.

description: Mark your foe with an arcane sigil that leaves them vulnerable to your elemental assault.

name: Open Hand of Mercy
description: You seal the fate of your foes, confident in the judgment you cast upon them.

name: Albrecht`s Duality
description: "Master Albrecht, creator of the aether ray, was renowned not only for his mastery of the arcane, but also his connection to the eldritch gods; a fact that garnered him much legal trouble and would have ended in his execution if not for the intervention of the Gildam Arcanum."

skill_params.state_name: Chaos Damage converted to Aether Damage

description: A ring of spectral flame expands around you, crippling your foes.

name: Belgothian`s Sigil
description: A fresh kill invigorates you, giving you momentum towards the next foes.

name: Glyph of the Storm Witch
description: Immense electric force emanates from you, cascading to additional enemies.

skill_params.state_name: Aether Damage converted to Lightning Damage

name: Jaxxon`s Lucky Bullet
description: Fire a spread of bullets at your enemies. With that many attempts, luck just may not have anything to do with it. This is a ranged technique that activates off of default weapon attacks.

name: Prime Ring of Morgoneth
description: "The Ring of Grand Magus Morgoneth whispers to you in a cursed tongue. Through this ring, Morgoneth`s command over the other magi was said to be absolute."
